issue.title: Jackson2ExecutionContextStringSerializer ignores QName prefix

labels.name: status: waiting-for-triage
labels.description: Issues that we did not analyse yet

repository.name: spring-batch
repository.description: Spring Batch is a framework for writing batch applications using Java and Spring

body:
Thank you for reporting this @jpraet.

I can see the problem, but it'll probably be difficult to resolve in a backwards-compatible way.

PRs welcome.

issue.title: Fix #4771: Add feature for QNAME serialization and deserialization.

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body: This commit fixes #4771 by adding serialization and deserialization features to control whether a QName is serialized to a string using the `QName.toString()` method (the only option currently) or if it is serialized to JSON object (a new option to fix #4771).

issue.title: Fix #4771: Support OBJECT shape for QNAME serialization and deserialization.

labels.name: cla-received
labels.description: PR already covered by CLA (optional label)

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body: This commit fixes #4771 by supporting the JsonFormat OBJECT shape during serialization and deserialization.
